Script.Query: CREATE TABLE `calculationbasis_queries` ( `queryID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `helpText` TEXT, `layout` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryID`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `calculationbases` ( `calculationBasisID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `label` VARCHAR(255), `required` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `width` INTEGER UNSIGNED, `sortIndex` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formatValidator` VARCHAR(255), `queryID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`calculationBasisID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_queries_calculationbases` FOREIGN KEY `FK_queries_calculationbases`(`queryID`) REFERENCES `calculationbasis_queries` (`queryID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `calculationbasis_query_instance_values` ( `calculationBasisValueID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `queryInstanceID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `calculationBasisId` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `value` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`calculationBasisValueID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_values_instances` FOREIGN KEY (`queryInstanceID`) REFERENCES `calculationbasis_query_instances` (`queryInstanceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_values_calculationbases` FOREIGN KEY (`calculationBasisId`) REFERENCES `calculationBasis` (`calculationBasisId`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
ALTER TABLE `calculationBasis` ADD COLUMN `maxContentLength` INTEGER UNSIGNED AFTER `queryID`;
